title: Orfeó Català
text:
The Orfeó Català is a <a href="choral%20society">choral society</a> based in <a href="Barcelona">Barcelona</a>, Catalonia, Spain, which was founded in 1891 by <a href="Llu%C3%ADs%20Millet">Lluís Millet</a> and <a href="Amadeu%20Vives">Amadeu Vives</a>.
The <a href="Palau%20de%20la%20M%C3%BAsica%20Catalana">Palau de la Música Catalana</a>, a major Barcelona landmark, was commissioned for the choral society in 1904, and completed in 1908.
